original_text: The Lord God showed a vision to me. I saw a crowd of locusts. The Lord was ready to send them to destroy the crops in the fields. They would come after we had taken the early crops to give to the king. Then the later crops were beginning to make grain.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 내게 보이신 것이 이러하니라 왕이 풀을 벤 후 풀이 다시 움돋기 시작할 때에 주께서 메뚜기를 지으시매

sentences.original_text: The Lord God showed a vision to me
I saw a crowd of locusts
The Lord was ready to send them
to destroy the crops in the fields
They would come after we had taken the early crops
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리가 이른 작물을 거둔 후에 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then the later crops were beginning to make grain
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 늦은 작물들이 곡식을 만들기 시작하고 있었습니다
